body_html:
@aselle @lukaszkaiser @alisidd Related to the topic, finally got a chance to implement the regularizer from the paper. It passed the basic tests. Before I make a pull request, I wanted to ask if I should implement it's gradient in C++ as, it seems, all the gradients of regularizers are implemented as C++ ops.

Update: I apologize, there are quite a few gradients defined in Python here
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/904edee4456a61d50d5b1ffe9858a7772acc423e/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py
